description: Connor Maguire has a long night ahead of him at the office and is in desperate need of some rest and relaxation. Connor says he just wants to talk, but Paul Walker has seen this type of client before and knows that what he really needs is his big, hard cock in his mouth. Paul starts slow with some kissing, but this is enough to turn on Connor until all he wants is to suck Paul’s perfect, throbbing cock, and then drill his beautiful ass.
title: Executive Brothel Part 3
